query.title: All Open Bugs [Status 11, 13, 40]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;, h.rptdate, h.rptd_by, h.programmer, h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.rptdate),h.subject, h.upd_date, h.product_id, h.DO_BY_RELEASE, h.version_fixed from rpthead h where h.product_id in (1980) and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (11, 13, 40) and upper( h.DO_BY_RELEASE) not like upper('12%') and rownum < 1000 order by h.rptdate desc

query.title: All Fixed Bugs [Status 80]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;,h.rptdate,h.rptd_by,h.programmer,h.status, h.category, h.version_fixed,h.fixed_date, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.fixed_date),h.subject,h.product_id, h.DO_BY_RELEASE, h.utility_version from rpthead h where h.product_id in (1980) and upper( h.version_fixed) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (80) and rownum < 1000 order by h.fixed_date asc

query.title: All 3x Bugs [Status 30, 31, 32, 36]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;,h.rptdate,h.rptd_by,h.programmer,h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.upd_date), h.subject, h.product_id, h.DO_BY_RELEASE, h.version_fixed from rpthead h where h.product_id in (1980) and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (30, 31, 32, 36) and rownum < 1000 order by h.rptdate desc

query.title: All QABLK Bugs [Tag - QABLK]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;,h.rptdate,h.rptd_by,h.programmer,h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, h.version_fixed,h.subject, h.product_id, h.DO_BY_RELEASE from rpthead h , bug_tags bt where h.product_id in (1980) and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (11, 40, 30, 31, 32, 36) AND h.rptno = bt.rptno AND CATSEARCH(tags,'QABLK','')> 0 and rownum < 1000 order by h.rptno desc

query.title: External Bugs [Fixed in R2 and later]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;,h.rptdate,h.customer,h.programmer,h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, h.version_fixed ,h.subject, h.product_id, h.rptd_by, h.DO_BY_RELEASE from rpthead h where h.product_id in (1980) and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2%') and h.customer not like 'INTERNAL%' order by h.customer

query.title: All Bugs in Past 1 week
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;, h.rptdate, h.rptd_by, h.programmer, h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.rptdate),h.subject, h.upd_date, h.product_id, h.DO_BY_RELEASE, h.version_fixed from rpthead h where h.product_id in (1980) and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.rptdate > (sysdate - 7) order by h.rptdate desc

query.title: All Deferred Bugs [Logged in R2PS3]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;, h.rptdate, h.rptd_by, h.programmer, h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.rptdate),h.subject, h.upd_date, h.product_id, h.DO_BY_RELEASE, h.version_fixed from rpthead h where h.product_id in (1980) and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.DO_BY_RELEASE like upper('12%') and rownum < 1000 order by h.rptdate desc

query.title: All Open Bugs [Status 11, 40]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;, h.rptdate, h.rptd_by, h.programmer, h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.rptdate), h.subject, h.upd_date, h.product_id, h.DO_BY_RELEASE, h.version_fixed from rpthead h where h.product_id in (5565) and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (11, 40) and upper( h.DO_BY_RELEASE) not like upper('12%') and rownum < 1000 order by h.rptdate desc

query.title: All Fixed Bugs [Status 80]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;,h.rptdate,h.rptd_by,h.programmer,h.status, h.category, h.version_fixed,h.fixed_date, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.fixed_date),h.subject,h.product_id, h.DO_BY_RELEASE, h.utility_version from rpthead h where h.product_id in (5565) and upper( h.version_fixed) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (80) and rownum < 1000 order by h.fixed_date asc

query.title: All 3x Bugs [Status 30, 31, 32, 36]

query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;, h.rptdate, h.rptd_by, h.programmer, h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.rptdate),h.subject, h.upd_date, h.product_id, h.DO_BY_RELEASE, h.version_fixed from rpthead h where h.product_id in (5565) and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.DO_BY_RELEASE like upper('12%') and rownum < 1000 order by h.rptdate desc

query.title: All Open Bugs [Status 11, 40]
query.queryStr: select ' ' || h.rptno || '', h.rptdate, h.rptd_by, h.programmer, h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.rptdate),h.subject,h.product_id from rpthead h where h.product_id in (9436) and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (11, 40) and rownum < 1000 order by h.customer

query.title: All Fixed Bugs [Status 80]
query.queryStr: select &bugNo;,h.rptdate,h.rptd_by,h.programmer,h.status, h.category, h.version_fixed,h.fixed_date, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.fixed_date),h.subject,h.product_id from rpthead h where h.product_id in (9436) and upper( h.version_fixed) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (80) and rownum < 1000 order by h.customer

query.title: All 3x Bugs [Status 30, 31, 32, 36]
query.queryStr: select &bugNo;,h.rptdate,h.rptd_by,h.programmer,h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.upd_date), h.subject, h.product_id from rpthead h where h.product_id in (9436) and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (30, 31, 32, 36) and rownum < 1000 order by h.customer

query.title: Non INTERNAL Bugs [Fixed in R2 and later]
query.queryStr: select &bugNo;,h.rptdate,h.rptd_by,h.programmer,h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, h.version_fixed ,h.subject, h.product_id from rpthead h where h.product_id in (9436) and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2%') and rownum < 1000 and h.customer != 'INTERNAL' order by h.customer

query.title: All status 11, 40 bugs
query.queryStr: select h.rpthead from rpthead h where h.product_id = 1999

query.title: All status 3x bugs
query.queryStr: select h.rptno,h.rptdate,h.rptd_by,h.programmer,h.status,h.version_fixed,h.product_id,h.subject from rpthead h where h.product_id in (1980) and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (30, 31, 32, 33, 36) and rownum < 20000 and h.customer != 'INTERNAL' order by h.customer

query.title: All Open Bugs [Status 11, 13, 40]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;, h.rptdate, h.rptd_by, h.programmer, h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.rptdate),h.subject,h.product_id from rpthead h where h.product_id in (9344) and h.category in ('IDMHC') and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (11, 13, 40) and rownum < 1000 order by h.rptdate desc

query.title: All Fixed Bugs [Status 80]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;,h.rptdate,h.rptd_by,h.programmer,h.status, h.category, h.version_fixed,h.fixed_date, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.fixed_date),h.subject,h.product_id from rpthead h where h.product_id in (9344) and h.category in ('IDMHC') and upper( h.version_fixed) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (80) and rownum < 1000 order by h.fixed_date asc

query.title: All 3x Bugs [Status 30, 31, 32, 36]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;,h.rptdate,h.rptd_by,h.programmer,h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, trunc(sysdate) - (h.upd_date), h.subject, h.product_id from rpthead h where h.product_id in (9344) and h.category in ('IDMHC') and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (30, 31, 32, 36) and rownum < 1000 order by h.rptdate desc

query.title: All idmhc- Tagged Bugs [Tag - IDMHC-]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;,h.rptdate,h.rptd_by,h.programmer,h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, h.version_fixed,h.category,h.subject, bt.tags, h.product_id from rpthead h , bug_tags bt where h.product_id in (9344) and h.category in ('IDMHC') and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and h.status in (11, 40, 30, 31, 32, 36) AND h.rptno = bt.rptno AND CATSEARCH(tags,'IDMHC-*','')> 0 and rownum < 1000 order by h.rptdate desc

query.title: All Bugs [Status All]
query.queryStr: select '', &bugNo;, h.rptdate, h.rptd_by, h.programmer, h.status, h.category, h.utility_version, h.version_fixed, h.fixed_date, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.fixed_date), trunc(sysdate) - trunc(h.rptdate),h.subject,h.product_id from rpthead h where h.product_id in (9344) and h.category in ('IDMHC') and upper( h.utility_version) like upper('11.1.2.3%') and rownum < 1000 order by h.rptdate desc
